line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Instructs a mining drone to collect ore and return.
* If flying for 30 minutes or more then lets return home.
* Homebase has left the sector - No point chasing wait for return until we die.

sval.val: Error: drone miner variable not found.
DESCRIPTION: Instructs a mining drone to collect ore and return.
If flying for 30 minutes or more then lets return home.
Homebase has left the sector - No point chasing wait for return until we die.
